name: UBX-CFG-TMODE3
description: Time mode settings 3. Configures the receiver to be in Time Mode. The position referred to in this message is that of the Antenna Reference Point (ARP).

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Receiver mode flags. Bits 7..0: mode (Receiver Mode: 0 Disabled, 1 Survey In, 2 Fixed Mode (true ARP position information required), 3-255 Reserved). Bit 8: lla (Position is given in LAT/LON/ALT (default is ECEF)).

fields.name: ecefXOrLat
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF X coordinate (or latitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above

fields.name: ecefYOrLon
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Y coordinate (or longitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above

fields.name: ecefZOrAlt
fields.description: WGS84 ECEF Z coordinate (or altitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above

fields.name: ecefXOrLatHP
fields.description: High-precision WGS84 ECEF X coordinate (or latitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above. Must be in the range -99..+99. The precise WGS84 ECEF X coordinate in units of cm, or the precise WGS84 ECEF latitude in units of 1e-7 degrees, is given by ecefXOrLat + (ecefXOrLatHP * 1e-2)

fields.name: ecefYOrLonHP
fields.description: High-precision WGS84 ECEF Y coordinate (or longitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above. Must be in the range -99..+99. The precise WGS84 ECEF Y coordinate in units of cm, or the precise WGS84 ECEF longitude in units of 1e-7 degrees, is given by ecefYOrLon + (ecefYOrLonHP * 1e-2)

fields.name: ecefZOrAltHP
fields.description: High-precision WGS84 ECEF Z coordinate (or altitude) of the ARP position, depending on flags above. Must be in the range -99..+99. The precise WGS84 ECEF Z coordinate, or altitude coordinate, in units of cm is given by ecefZOrAlt + (ecefZOrAltHP * 1e-2)
